sense.gloss: to spread, to extend, to expand, to enlarge, to widen, to broaden
to unfold, to open, to unroll, to unwrap
to scatter about, to spread around
to make flourish, to cause to prosper

sdata.j: よい↑映画↑↓えいが↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑視野↑↓しや↓を↑広↑↓|ひろ↓げる|。
↑大学↑↓だいがく↓↑教育↑↓きょういく↓は↑知識↑↓ちしき↓を↑広↑↓|ひろ↓げる|ためのものだ。
sdata.e: University education is designed to expand your knowledge.

sdata.j: ↑鷲↑↓わし↓の↑羽↑↓はね↓は↑広↑↓|ひろ↓げる|と↑１↑↓いち↓メーターにもなる。
sdata.e: An eagle's wings are more than one meter across.

sdata.j: ↑波紋↑↓はもん↓を↑広↑↓|ひろ↓げる|ようなことを↑安易↑↓あんい↓に↑口走↑↓くちばし↓らないの！
sdata.e: I'm not going to carelessly blurt out something that would cause trouble!
